channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [MAHOUT-987] Our build is unstable - this should reduce our style warnings by >200
item.description:
If we're going to keep these Jenkins style rules, let's get our build stable!

Here's about 200 small fixes created by:

find . -name *java | xargs perl -pi -e 's/(if|while|for)(/$1 (/'

Any objections?
item.summary: Our build is unstable - this should reduce our style warnings by >200

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

Testing
-------

Thanks,

tom
Hey Tom, those look like mostly whitespace changes. I'd hate to miss an opportunity to reduce our style warnings for 0.7. I'm going to assign this to you so it doesn't get flushed tomorrow.

Hi Folks -

I've been heads-down on other things for a bit, and way behind on the
list. The code freeze date has snuck up on me, but I will try to get at
least one or two batches of style fixes in over the next 24 hrs.

Jeff, thanks for flagging this and causing it to bubble up on my radar!

-tom

Integrated in Mahout-Quality #1482 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/Mahout-Quality/1482/)
